title: muruganai tirumAl
sahitya:
muruganai tirumAl maruganai nI orupOdum inimEl maravAdiru manamE


anupallavi

  parama krpAkaranai bhakta paripAlanai paramEsha samEta pArvati kumAranai


caraNam    karuttunadai avan kazhalaDi nizhalilE nirutti nI negizha nidamum tozhudAl
varuttam Edum unnai vadaittu vATTAmal turatti OTTiDum tirattai UTTuvAn
